price: 27 Mais si sa tunique est déchirée par derrière, alors c’est elle qui ment et lui qui est sincère. »
arabic: وَإِن كَانَ قَمِيصُهُۥ قُدَّ مِن دُبُرٖ فَكَذَبَتۡ وَهُوَ مِنَ ٱلصَّٰدِقِينَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: wa-in kāna qamīṣuhu qudda min duburin fakadhabat wahuwa mina al-ṣādiqīna
